name: Santa Civil War
description:
Quick! Take Santa's hat and defeat the upset elf to save him. It's all up to you to take down the unhappy elf.

This game was made with the theme of saving Christmas and having a Santa Hat object!

Created by August (Auginomicon) Cassin & Gerard Williams

  • Credits
    • Assets
      • Fantasy RPG - Snow exapnsion pack by Franuka
      • RPG Christmas Battlers by Franuka
    • Music
      • Combat: 8 Bit Universe - Topic
      • World + Main Menu: Christmas Music Pack by VOiD1 Gaming
  • Controls!
    • Arrow keys: Movement
    • Space: Interact
    • Mouse: For UI navigation
